name: Blobbo Globbo
description:
Plug in your controllers and grab a friend: it's time to play Blobbo Globbo! 

Shoot the blobs to trap them, then give them a kick to send them flying down the screen. The more blobs you can run over, the higher the score bonus.

Blobbo Globbo is an homage to the arcade classic Bubble Bobble and its relatives such as Snow Bros. and Tumble Pop. 

Made with Godot Engine. Special thanks to Kenney for the excellent free art assets.

This game was made for National Game Design Month 2021. You can read all about the design and development on my blog.

This free software is licensed under the GNU General Public License (GPL). You can find the source code in the public GitHub repository.
